allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Supabase type compatibility for Vercel deployment

- Update database.types.ts with Relationships arrays required by Supabase client v2.90
- Add missing api_sync_log table type definition
- Add CompositeTypes section and helper type exports \(Tables, TablesInsert, etc.\)
- Fix NFLApiClient supabase property type to use Awaited<ReturnType<>>

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add pool rules and remove 3rd place medal

- Add Pool Rules section to leaderboard page with entry fee \($10\), prize split \(70%/30%\), and payment options \(PayPal/Venmo\)
- Remove 3rd place medal from all leaderboard tables \(only 1st and 2nd place prizes\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
